name: proto choros
description:
Play thru six challenging levels in Proto Choros.

This is a sci-fi shooter / bullet-hell made for low rez jam 2016.

Learn the patterns to save the pix-elated universe.

CONTROLS:

W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move around.

Space-bar to shoot.

The progress bar on the left is your COMBO, once full, your fire-rate ++

The progress bar on the right indicates how close you are from the end of the level.

Have fun,

G .C .
